allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Twitch VOD Manager v3.5.3

- Main application with auto-update functionality
- PyInstaller spec for building standalone EXE
- Inno Setup installer script with silent update support
- Server version.json for update checking

Features:
- Download Twitch VODs
- Auto-update with silent installation
- Settings stored in ProgramData

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh release create v3.6.0 "release/Twitch VOD Manager Setup 3.6.0.exe" --title "Twitch VOD Manager v3.6.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New in v3.6.0

### New Features
- **Video Cutter** - Cut and trim your downloaded VODs with a visual timeline
  - Preview frames at any position
  - Set precise start and end times
  - Fast cutting using stream copy \(no re-encoding\)
  
- **Video Merge** - Combine multiple video files into one
  - Add multiple videos and reorder them
  - Fast merging with stream copy
  
- **Part-based Downloads** - Split long VODs into manageable segments
  - Configure segment length in settings
  - Automatically splits downloads into parts

### Improvements
- Enhanced download progress with speed and ETA display
- New navigation tabs for better organization
- Updated UI with new tool icons

### Technical
- FFmpeg/FFprobe integration for video processing
- Improved IPC communication between main and renderer
- Version bump to 3.6.0
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" release create v3.6.1 "release/Twitch VOD Manager Setup 3.6.1.exe" --title "Twitch VOD Manager v3.6.1" --notes "## What''s New in v3.6.1

### New Feature: Clip erstellen
- **Time-Range Downloads** - Download specific portions of VODs
  - Click ''Clip'' button on any VOD
  - Use sliders or time inputs to select start/end times
  - Set custom part numbers for continuations
  - Downloads only the selected time range

### All Features \(v3.6.x\)
- VOD Downloads \(full or part-based\)
- Clip Downloads from Twitch
- Video Cutter for local files \(FFmpeg\)
- Video Merge \(combine multiple videos\)
- Time-Range VOD Downloads \(new\)
- Multiple Themes \(Twitch/Discord/YouTube/Apple\)
- Auto-Update Check

### Technical
- Uses streamlink --hls-start-offset and --hls-duration for precise downloads
- CustomClip data structure for queue items")
